data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Xinzhou.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xinzhou, Shanxi, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Xinzhou, Shanxi, China to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Xinzhou.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Xinzhou to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Xinzhou to agree with you and with one another.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 17,971 believers in Xinzhou, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the county of Xinzhou, Shanxi, China has a population of 236,900.

We estimate Xinzhou has 17,971 people who might know Jesus, 3,827 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 215,101 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Xinzhou access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
